name: Fashion Diva
description:
Games2Win is a fun company that believes in creating amazing and enjoyable games for all ages. We have over 800+ proprietary games that are available both online and on mobile. Some of our smash hit games are Parking Frenzy, Star Fashion Designer, Fashion Diva, Power Cricket T20 and BFF High School Fashion. Currently, our company boasts of more than 100 million app downloads and 3 million gamers a month. And this is just the beginning!

VISIT US: http://games2win.com

LIKE US: http://facebook.com/Games2win

FOLLOW US: http://twitter.com/Games2win

Contact us at mobile@games2win.com for any problems you may have with Fashion Diva.
